pkgmetadata.longdescription: ODE is a free, industrial quality library for simulating articulated rigid body dynamics - for example ground vehicles, legged creatures, and moving objects in VR environments. It is fast, flexible, robust and platform independent, with advanced joints, contact with friction, and built-in collision detection.

use.flag: more precise calculations at the expense of speed
enable use of the old trimesh collider
use TLS for global caches (allows threaded collision checks for isolated spaces)
include built-in multithreaded threading implementation (still must be created and assigned to be used)
use the gimpact system for trimesh support
use the opcode system for trimesh support
